verses.roman:
keha 'prakharā', keha 'mṛdu', keha haya 'samā'
sva-svabhāve kṛṣṇera bāḍāya prema-sīmā

synonyms: keha—some; prakharā—very talkative; keha—some; mṛdu—very mild; keha haya—some of them are; samā—equipoised; sva-svabhāve—by their own characteristics; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; bāḍāya—increases; prema-sīmā—limit of loving ecstasy.
translation: "Some of them are very talkative, some are mild, and some are equipoised. Each heroine, according to her own character, increases Śrī Kṛṣṇa's loving ecstasy.
